name: FURI
description: FURI is the foundation of a shared reward economy. Built on Polygon, FURI connects multiple Web2 and Web3 projects through a single, sustainable token ecosystem. Users earn F Points for their engagement and periodically convert them into FURI tokens, which they can trade or stake for exclusive benefits. Backed by real fiat revenue from partner projects, FURI is designed to grow in value as adoption expands. Join an ecosystem where loyalty is rewarded, and every interaction builds value.
